hero.tagline: Modular TikTok Shop SDK for Node.js and Web Frameworks
hero.subtitle: A lightweight SDK that simplifies TikTok Shop API usage for developers—no boilerplate, no guesswork.

quickLinks.title: Quick Install
quickLinks.subtitle: Start using the SDK in seconds. Just install and import—no boilerplate, no config.
features: Supports Node.js, SvelteKit, Next.js, and other modern frameworks
TypeScript-first with built-in types and error helpers
Lightweight and modular—only import what you need

featuresSection.title: Supported Features
featuresSection.subtitle: The SDK covers essential TikTok Shop APIs with clear methods and built-in types—ready for production use.

items.title: Order API
items.description: Fetch, filter, and paginate orders with full type safety and error handling.

items.title: Product Sync
items.description: Sync product listings, update inventory, and manage SKUs programmatically.

items.title: Webhook Verification
items.description: Verify incoming webhooks with built-in signature validation and timestamp checks.

items.title: Token Refresh
items.description: Automatically refresh expired tokens using secure OAuth2 flows.

items.title: Error Types
items.description: Catch and classify API errors with typed exceptions like TikTokAPIError.

items.title: Modular Imports
items.description: Import only what you need—no unused code, no bloated bundles.

githubSection.title: Open Source & GitHub
githubSection.subtitle: This SDK is fully open source—built for transparency, collaboration, and rapid iteration. Contributions are welcome!

contributorsSection.title: Contributors
contributorsSection.subtitle: Join us on GitHub and help improve the SDK.

items.title: MIT Licensed
items.description: Fully open source under the MIT License.

items.title: Star us on GitHub
items.description: Show your support and follow the development.

items.title: Actively maintained
items.description: Regular updates and improvements by the core team.

items.title: Open to contributors
items.description: Contributions are welcome from developers worldwide.
